robDex.util.option

Class Option<T>

  • Object
    • Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the option
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressOption, IntOption, StringOption

    abstract class Option<T>
extends Object
    This class is used to manage the program's options for better use and readability.
    Author:
    Nicolas Fedy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<String> aliases
      names the user can use to refer to this option.
      private boolean modified
      true if the value has been modified by the user, false otherwise.
      private T value
      Option's value.

      Creates an option.

      Returns the value of the first alias belonging to this option.

      • Option

        protected Option(T defaultValue,
                 String alias,
                 String... aliases)
        Creates an option.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - default value of this option.
        alias - alias for this option.
        aliases - additional aliases for this option.

      • getFirstValue

        protected String getFirstValue(String[] args)
                        throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the value of the first alias belonging to this option.
        Parameters:
        args - the program's arguments
        Returns:
        the value of the first alias belonging to this option
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the alias doesn't have a value not beginning with '-'

      • scan

        public abstract void scan(String[] args)
                   throws Exception
        Scan args to look for any matching alias to this option, and sets its value accordingly.
        Parameters:
        args - array to be scanned
        Throws:
        Exception - if the scanned option's value is invalid.
